Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: Adam S.
Reviews.Content: I got this camera because my fiancé and I were going on vacation to Turks and Caicos.  This camera did not disappoint one bit.  The toughness of the camera and the clarity mixed make it top of the line.  I will be using this camera for all of my trips for a long time coming.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 8 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Olympus Stylus Tough TG-2 iHS 12 MP Waterproof & Shockproof Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black)
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Deluxe Design Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pocket and Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Legged Mini Table Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Floating Foam Camera Strap - BONUS  Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Stylus Tough TG-2 iHS 12 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Black) + 7pc Bundle 32GB Accessory Kit
